message.content:
What happened to Shahidullah Shahid?

Shahidullah Shahid, whose real name was Sheikh Maqbool Orakzai, was a senior member of the Pakistani Taliban (Tehreek-i-Taliban Pakistan or TTP) and later joined ISISâ€™s Khorasan Province (ISIS-K). He served as the spokesman for the Pakistani Taliban and became one of several high-ranking leaders who defected from TTP in favor of ISIS. 

Shahidullah Shahid reportedly died in July 2015 during a drone strike carried out by US forces in Afghanistan. The drone targeted a group suspected to be plotting attacks on NATO-led troops stationed there at that time.
